title: Pippin, Hobbit of Some Intelligence (1R307)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Companion • Hobbit
Strength:	3
Vitality:	4
Resistance:	6
Signet:	Gandalf
Game Text:	When you play Pippin, remove a burden or wound from a companion.
Lore:	”'Anyway, you need people of intelligence on this sort of mission… quest… thing.'”
Rarity:	R
Notes:	Version: +.
